text.v: Hóa đơn dịch vụ trả lại nhà cung cấp

processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @max1 int, @max2 int, @count int, @roundPrice int, @roundAmount int, @roundFAmount int select @d0 = getdate(), @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', ''), 1) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'm&Detail;$000000', @detail = 'd&Detail;$000000', @inquiry = 'i&Detail;$000000', @voucherID = '&Code;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Chứng từ số %s1 ngày %s2 tại dòng %s3 đã tồn tại.' else 'The voucher number %s1 dated %s2 at row %s3 already exists.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @roundPrice = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_gia' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @roundFAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien_nt' select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master and column_name = 'so_ct' select @max2 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @detail and column_name = 'so_lsx' -- Checking update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)) &ImportOverwriteData; if @check$Unit <> '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join m&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join m&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end else begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C002' from @@table a join m&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join m&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end if @r is not null and @$mode <> 1 begin if @check$Unit <> '1' select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r else select replace(replace(replace(replace(@duplicate$Unit, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', rtrim(ma_dvcs)), '%s4', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end -- Update update @@table set so_lsx = space(@max2 - len(ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)))) + ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)), ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, tk = case when a.tk <> '' then a.tk else c.tk end, tk_thue = case when a.tk_thue <> '' then a.tk_thue else isnull(d.tk_thue_co3, '') end from @@table a left join dmkh c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #unit from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct from @@table group by ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; -- Checking @@checking(1); &ConfigDynamicImportChecking; &ImportOverwriteChecking;&EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a&ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, tk_co, dvt, so_luong, gia_nt, gia, tien_nt, tien, thue_nt, thue, dien_giai, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldDetail; into #d&Detail; from d&Detail;$000000 insert into #d&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.tk_co, a.dvt, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt, round(a.gia_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundPrice), a.tien_nt, round(a.tien_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), round(a.tien_nt * (d.thue_suat / 100), case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then @roundAmount else @roundFAmount end), round(a.tien_nt * a.ty_gia * (d.thue_suat / 100), @roundAmount), a.dien_giai_d, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldDetailInsert; from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt update #d&Detail; set thue_nt = isnull(thue_nt,0), thue = isnull(thue,0) &VoucherGoodsTypeImportDetailUpdate; select top 0 stt_rec, status, ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, so_seri, tk, tk_thue, ma_thue, ma_tc, mau_bc, ma_kh, ong_ba, ma_kh2, outvat_yn, dien_giai, ten_vt, ghi_chu, ma_nt, ty_gia, thue_suat, t_so_luong, t_thue_nt, t_thue, t_tien_nt, t_tien&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldMaster; into #m&Detail; from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #m&Detail; select b.stt_rec, @status, a.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.so_seri, a.tk, a.tk_thue, a.ma_thue, a.ma_tc, a.mau_bc, a.ma_kh, '', a.ma_kh2, a.outvat_yn, a.dien_giai, a.ten_vt, a.ghi_chu, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, isnull(e.thue_suat,0), d.t_so_luong, d.t_thue_nt, d.t_thue, d.t_tien_nt, d.t_tien&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldMasterInsert; from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt left join dmthue e on a.ma_thue = e.ma_thue &VoucherGoodsTypeImportMasterJoin;join (select stt_rec, 0 as t_so_luong, sum(thue_nt) as t_thue_nt, sum(thue) as t_thue, sum(tien_nt) as t_tien_nt, sum(tien) as t_tien from #d&Detail;&VoucherGoodsTypeImportMasterWhere; group by stt_rec) d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec &VoucherGoodsTypeImportMasterUpdate; select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i&Detail; from i&Detail;$000000 insert into #i&Detail; select stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_kh) + '#20$' + rtrim(tk) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_nt) + '#40$' + rtrim(ma_thue), '' from #m&Detail; select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', 'd$', 'tk_co', '#10$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert @@inserting(master); @@inserting(detail); @@inserting(inquiry); &ESImportInsert; &ImportOverwriteInserting; declare @External nvarchar(4000), @Statement nvarchar(4000), @Numeric varchar(4000), @String varchar(4000), @fieldSelect varchar(4000) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id if @status <> 0 begin &VoucherGoodsTypeImportPost; select top 0 * into #dpost from #d&Detail; -- ctgt30 select * into #mpost from #m&Detail; where outvat_yn = 0 and ma_thue <> '' if (select count(1) from #mpost) > 0 begin update #mpost set ten_vt = case when ten_vt <> '' then ten_vt else dien_giai end, t_tien_nt = -t_tien_nt, t_tien = -t_tien, t_thue_nt = -t_thue_nt, t_thue = -t_thue insert into #dpost select * from #d&Detail; where line_nbr = 1 and stt_rec in (select stt_rec from #mpost) select @External = 'ngay_ct0 = c.ngay_ct, so_ct0 = ltrim(c.so_ct), so_seri0 = rtrim(c.so_seri), ghi_chu = c.ghi_chu, tk_du = c.tk, tk_thue_no = c.tk_thue, t_tien_nt = c.t_tien_nt, t_tien = c.t_tien, line_nbr = 1, status = ''' + @status + ''',ma_ct = ''' + @voucherID + ''', loai_ct = '''', ngay_lct = b.ngay_ct, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) select @Statement = '', @Numeric = 'so_luong, gia_nt, gia, nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ghi_chu, ma_tt, so_dh, ma_mau_ct, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3' &VoucherGoodsTypeImportPostTaxIn; exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostTax '#mpost', '#dpost', '#k', @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '2' end -- ctgt20 truncate table #mpost truncate table #dpost insert into #mpost select * from #m&Detail; where outvat_yn = 1 and ma_thue <> '' if (select count(1) from #mpost) > 0 begin update #mpost set ten_vt = case when ten_vt <> '' then ten_vt else dien_giai end insert into #dpost select * from #d&Detail; where line_nbr = 1 and stt_rec in (select stt_rec from #mpost) select @External = 'tk_du = c.tk, tk_thue_co = c.tk_thue, ghi_chu = c.ghi_chu, t_tien_nt2 = c.t_tien_nt, t_tien2 = c.t_tien, line_nbr = 1, status = ''' + @status + ''',ma_ct = ''' + @voucherID + ''', loai_ct = '''', ngay_lct = b.ngay_ct, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) select @Statement = '', @Numeric = 'nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ghi_chu, ma_nvbh,so_dh, ma_nk, ma_mau_ct, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3' &VoucherGoodsTypeImportPostTaxOut; exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostTax '#mpost', '#dpost', '#k', @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '1' end select *,cast('' as char(2)) as loai_ct, (t_tien_nt + t_thue) as t_tt_nt, (t_tien + t_thue) as t_tt, @voucherID as ma_ct, @datetime0 as datetime0, @datetime0 as datetime2, @user as user_id0, @user as user_id2 into #malloc from #m&Detail; exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$Allocation @voucherID, '0', '#malloc', '', 't_tt_nt', 't_tt', 'tt_nt', 'tt', 'cttt60', '', '' end if @status = '1' begin select @fieldSelect = 'stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ''' + @voucherID + ''', ngay_ct, so_ct, t_tien_nt + t_thue_nt, t_tien + t_thue, ma_nt, ty_gia, dien_giai, ''' + @datetime0 + ''', ' + rtrim(@user) exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostLater '#m&Detail;', @voucherID, @fieldSelect, '' end if @status = '2' begin declare @glGroup varchar(128), @glAcctField varchar(128), @glAcctFieldRef varchar(128), @glAmountField varchar(128), @glFCAmountField varchar(128), @glKey varchar(512), @glNoAccList VARCHAR(128), @glNoAccListRef VARCHAR(128), @glGroups varchar(128) select @glAcctField = 'tk,tk_thue_no', @glAcctFieldRef = 'tk_co,tk_thue_co', @glAmountField = 'tien,thue', @glFCAmountField = 'tien_nt,thue_nt', @glKey = '1=1,thue_nt + thue <> 0', @glNoAccList = '1,1', @glNoAccListRef = '0,0', @glGroups = '1,0' select @Numeric = 'nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ma_nk, ma_gd, so_lo, ong_ba, so_dh, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3', @External = 'ct_nxt = 2, dien_giai_h = b.dien_giai, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user), @Statement = 'update #gl set ma_kh = b.ma_kh2 from #gl a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.tk = b.tk_thue and b.ma_kh2 <> ''''' select @Statement = @Statement + char(13) + 'update #gl set dien_giai = b.dien_giai from #gl a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and (a.tk = b.tk_thue or a.tk_du = b.tk_thue)' select @Statement = @Statement + char(13) + 'update #gl set ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct, so_ct0 = ltrim(b.so_ct) from #gl a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where b.ma_thue <> ''''' select @glGroup = groupby from @@sysDatabaseName..voucherinfo where ma_ct = @voucherID update #m&Detail; set ma_kh2 = '' where tk_thue in (select tk from dmtk where tk_cn = 0) select a.*, b.tk, 0*tien as tien2, 0*tien_nt as tien_nt2, b.tk as tk_thue_no, b.tk_thue as tk_thue_co, cast('' as char(32)) as tk_vt, cast('' as char(32)) as tk_dt, cast('' as char(32)) as tk_gv,b.ma_dvcs, b.ma_kh, b.ma_kh as ma_kh_ref, @voucherID as ma_ct, cast('' as char(2)) as loai_ct, b.ngay_ct as ngay_lct, b.ma_nt, b.ty_gia, b.dien_giai as dien_giai_h into #dGL from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostGL '#m&Detail;', '#dGL', @voucherID, @glAcctField, @glAcctFieldRef, @glAmountField, @glFCAmountField, @glKey, @glNoAccList, @glNoAccListRef, @glGroup, @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '#k', @glGroups end
